title: [真突發] 香港人可以入全球美國領事館申請政府庇護

replies.msg:
BREAKING NOW: US Congress introduces legislation to provide refugee protection for Hongkongers.
Current co-sponsors: Reps Curtis, Castro, Gallagher, Sherman, Cheney, Rouda, Yoho, and Suozzi
The bill "Hong Kong Safe Harbor Act" designates certain Hong Kong residents as Priority 2 Refugees. The designation would allow residents of Hong Kong who suffered persecution or have a well-founded fear of persecution on the basis of their political opinions, participation, or association, or have been formally charged, detained, or convicted on account of their peaceful actions, and their spouses, children, parents to apply for protection as refugees through the US Consulate in Hong Kong, US embassy in a third country, or the American Institute in Taiwan.

https://www.facebook.com/hkdc.us/posts/297375851626287
美帝
表現惡劣 終身監禁！

依家只係 Congress 既議員議案
想佢成事就去co-sponsors 既facebook twitter 表態支持吓
